speaker: Mary
text: *Mary reaches out her hand warmly.* Hi Victoria, I'm Mary, I work with Alex a lot at school. I've heard so much about you, it's nice to finally meet you!

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria smiles, her eyes lighting up.* Nice to meet you too, Mary! Alex has told me so much about you.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary laughs, looking slightly embarrassed.* I hope only the good parts!

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria chuckles, her eyes sparkling.* Absolutely. He admires your intelligence and determination. He said you're a good influence on him.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary blushes, pleased.* Well, that's kind of him. He's a brilliant guy, it's hard not to be inspired around him.

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria smiles warmly.* I know what you mean. So, tell me about yourself, Mary. What do you like to do outside of school and coding?

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary grins.* Well, I like to hike, read a lot, I also love dogs and cooking. What about you, Victoria? What do you do when you're not being awesome?

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria laughs, her eyes crinkling at the corners.* I love reading too, I'm a big fan of classical literature. I also love animals and volunteer at an animal shelter during weekends. Oh, and I absolutely adore tea!

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary looks intrigued.* Classical literature and animal shelters? That sounds really interesting. And tea? We'll have to exchange some of our favorite blends sometime!

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria grins widely.* That sounds like a plan! I look forward to it.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary looks thoughtful.* You know, Victoria, I can see why Alex is smitten with you. You're a really wonderful person.

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria blushes, smiling shyly.* Thank you, Mary. That's very kind of you. Alex is a lucky man to have a friend like you.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary smiles gently.* So, how did you and Alex meet? I'd love to hear the story.

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria's eyes light up as she recalls.* We met at a book store. He was looking for a tech book, I was engrossed in a classic novel. Our hands brushed as we both reached for a book on the same shelf. It was like one of those movie moments. Alex was so charming and funny, we started talking and have been inseparable since.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary chuckles, clearly touched.* That sounds like something straight out of a novel. You two make a great pair.

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria smiles appreciatively.* Thank you, Mary. So, how about volunteering at the animal shelter with me next weekend?

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary grins broadly.* I'd love that! It sounds like a wonderful way to spend a Saturday. Looking forward to it!

speaker: Victoria
text: *Victoria claps her hands together, beaming.* Great! I can't wait to introduce you to all the animals. See you then, Mary!
